channel.title: Mod the hub with multiple input ports
channel.description:
Can or has anyone create a hub mod that has multiple input ports for belts? Though I would suggest a way to unlock the smart splitter and overflow feature earlier. Would prevent manual loading of the hub - because you know the game is all about automation...
I've never made mods myself
